products.name: Hydrating Face Cream
products.description: A deeply hydrating face cream that nourishes and moisturizes your skin. Contains natural ingredients like hyaluronic acid and vitamin E.

products.name: Matte Lipstick
products.description: Long-lasting matte lipstick with rich pigmentation. Available in various shades to complement any skin tone.

products.name: Natural Mascara
products.description: Volumizing mascara with natural ingredients. Adds length and volume to your lashes without clumping.

products.name: Facial Cleanser
products.description: Gentle facial cleanser that removes impurities while maintaining your skin's natural moisture balance.

products.name: Eyeshadow Palette
products.description: Professional eyeshadow palette with 12 highly pigmented shades. Perfect for creating both natural and dramatic looks.

products.name: Facial Toner
products.description: Refreshing facial toner that balances pH levels and prepares your skin for the next steps in your skincare routine.

products.name: Blush Palette
products.description: Versatile blush palette featuring 6 complementary shades. Buildable formula for a natural to dramatic flush of color.

products.name: Vitamin C Serum
products.description: Brightening vitamin C serum that helps reduce dark spots and evens skin tone. Contains 20% vitamin C and hyaluronic acid.
